project01.title: Study Tracker
project01.description: Powered by Vue and Bulma, Study Tracker is a web application for time-stamping study assignments.

project02.title: Digital Curriculum Vitae
project02.description: Created in JS Vanilla, the Digital Curriculum Vitae is a web page developed as a solution for a client who needed to make his professional data available in a practical and visually attractive way.

project03.title: CliNutri
project03.description: Developed in JS Vanilla as a solution for a client who needed to register and calculate the BMI of their patients in a nutrition clinic.
